name: letrid
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wo(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c0)))

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wo(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c0)), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c0)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wo(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c0)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wo(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c0)))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wo(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c0)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))

comment: Trichotomy law for 'less than or equal to'. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
